message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $8,000 right now.  What do you think?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,000 is still a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $9,000.  Let me know if that works for you.
